sentences.english: Do you agree that only elected District Council members should take part in the election?
sentences.chinese: 是否赞成只由民选区议员参与互选？

sentences.english: We have hundreds of constituencies and the votes in each one ele …
sentences.chinese: 我们有数百个选区，每个选区通过投票议会选举。

sentences.english: We have hundreds of constituencies and the votes in each one ele …
sentences.chinese: 我们有数百个选区，每个选区通过投票议会选举。

sentences.english: Five of the new seats will be directly elected, representing geographical constituencies.
sentences.chinese: 新增加席位中有五人来自直选，分别代表各个选区。

sentences.english: This should bring up a marquee around the planet.
sentences.chinese: 这样应当会在行星四周生成一个矩形选区。

sentences.english: American trade unions, an important Democratic constituency, are decidedly unenthusiastic.
sentences.chinese: 民主党的重要选区美国贸易工会显然缺乏热情。

sentences.english: Fortunately we haven't seen any of them show up in the Charlottetown riding.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是我们并没有看到他们出现在夏洛特城选区。

sentences.english: Using the Rectangular Marquee Tool (M), create a rectangular selection, then use the Brush Tool (B) to select a big, rounded brush.
sentences.chinese: 用矩形选框工具，建立矩形选区。

sentences.english: Workers' Party (WP) reaching out to the constituents of Aljunied GRC.
sentences.chinese: 工人党走访阿裕尼集选区，接见选民。

sentences.english: All the subscribers must be registered electors of the Hoi Sham constituency.
sentences.chinese: 所有签署人士必须已登记为海心选区的选民。

sentences.english: She did not win a majority of the Somali-American votes in her district.
sentences.chinese: 她在自己的选区未能赢得多数索马里裔美国人的选票。

sentences.english: Finally, the victory in Aljunied shows the importance of positive thinking.
sentences.chinese: 最终，在阿裕尼选区的胜利显示出积极思想的重要性。

sentences.english: Article 5 Deputies shall be subject to the supervision of the voters of the electoral districts or the electoral units that elected them.
sentences.chinese: 第五条代表受原选区选民或者原选举单位的监督。

sentences.english: Create another selection and fill with a new gradient.
sentences.chinese: 在新建一个选区，使用一个新的渐变色填充。

sentences.english: No clones to unlink in the selection.
sentences.chinese: 选区里没有克隆来解除链接。

sentences.english: Esther Yang, who is running for New York State Assemble 74th District, visited CCBA.
sentences.chinese: 有意参选纽约州74选区众议员的杨天发访中华公所。

definition: seat in a parliament or legislative assembly
